++ Table Of Multiple Data Types

+++ SUMMARY

* C/C++ Arrays do not support multiple data types.

* An example of a mixed data type table mapping integers to string
  1, "I"
  2, "II"
  3, "III"
  4, "IV"



* options to implement a table of mixed data types:
  * std::map is an option
  * alternatively you can make a class or structure


+++ EXAMPLE
  TableOfMultipleDataTypesAsStruct
